Webinar: Software-Driven Network Control
Delivering the Promise of SDN <http://vmturbo.com/arista-networks-webinar?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=aristaeos&utm_content=121014>
Wednesday, December 17, 2014 | 1 p.m. EST | 10 a.m. GMT Arista Networks <http://arista.com/>’ software-driven cloud networking, driven by the ground-breaking EOS™ network OS, is delivering the promise of software-defined networking (SDN) through a combination of high-bandwidth components and programmable switches: providing modern core architecture, and enabling in-service upgrades and application extensibility with single-image consistency.
Join us on December 17th to learn about Arista Networks’ methodologies and exciting disruptions within the network landscape, as well as the ways in which VMTurbo drives dynamic network localization decisions to achieve near-zero latency in Arista environments. You'll learn:
- The features and benefits of the Arista ecosystem - The features and benefits of VMTurbo's control solution - The augmented benefits of running the solutions together - A live demonstration of VMTurbo 5.0 Network Control Register Now <http://vmturbo.com/arista-networks-webinar?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=aristaeos&utm_content=121014> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
